General.Name: Sweeten Real Estate Development Co Ltd
General.Description: Sweeten Real Estate Development Co.,Ltd. constructs, develops, leases, and sells residential, commercial, and industrial projects. It is also involved in the development, rental, and sale of office building, specific professional zones, and urban renewal; trading of construction materials; rental of hotel; and civil construction and land development activities. The company was incorporated in 1987 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.
